description:
A god`s love of his fellow creatures is tested.  A strange-colored deer holds the key to a cure. A priest demands the return of a jewel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inaba no Shiro Usagi / Kushiki Iro no Ooshika / Sangosu no Tama
The White Rabbit of Inaba / The Giant, Strange-Colored Deer / The Jewel of Sangosu
因幡の白兎 / 奇しき色の大鹿 / サンゴスの玉
